old_tinker_overworld: Ah, a traveler! Haven't seen one in ages.
The scrap piles around here hold useful parts.
Watch out for Rust Golems in the eastern corridors.
sparks_overworld: Bzzt! I used to be a maintenance bot.
My circuits are a bit scrambled these days...
If you find any spare capacitors, I'd be grateful!
drifter_overworld: There's something lurking in the south tunnels.
I've heard strange sounds coming from the walls.
scout_overworld: I've mapped most of this sector.
The northwest rooms are relatively safe.
But the open areas? That's where the rats swarm.
shopkeeper: Welcome to my shop! Best repairs in the sector.
Take a look at what I've got!
engineer_factory: You made it past the Guardian? Impressive.
This factory still has working assembly lines...
Be careful deeper in. The Plasma Hounds hunt in packs.
weaponsmith: Finest blades this side of the wastes.
Every edge has a story. Pick yours.
quest_spare_parts_offer: I'm running low on parts for my repairs.
Could you gather 5 Scrap Metal for me?
I'll make it worth your while!
quest_spare_parts_active: Still looking for that Scrap Metal?
I need 5 pieces. Check the scrap piles around here.
quest_spare_parts_complete: You found all the scrap! Wonderful!
Here's your payment. Good doing business!
quest_spare_parts_done: Thanks again for the scrap. My shelves are stocked!
Let me know if you need anything.
quest_pest_control_offer: Those Scrap Rats are everywhere lately.
If you could take out 4 of them, the sector would be safer.
I'll share my supply cache as thanks.
quest_pest_control_active: Still rats skittering around out there.
Keep hunting them down. We need 4 eliminated.
quest_pest_control_complete: The sector's quieter already. Nice work!
Here, take these supplies. You've earned them.
quest_pest_control_done: Sector's been peaceful since you cleared those rats.
You're a real asset around here.
quest_deep_recon_offer: There's a cave to the south... the Scrap Cave.
I need someone to scout it and deal with the Volt Wraiths.
Visit the cave and defeat 2 Volt Wraiths. Can you handle it?
quest_deep_recon_active: Head south to the Scrap Cave.
I need you to explore it and take down 2 Volt Wraiths.
quest_deep_recon_complete: You've been to the cave AND dealt with the Wraiths?
Incredible. Take this blade I've been saving.
quest_deep_recon_done: The cave intel has been invaluable.
quest_circuit_restore_offer: Bzzt! My circuits are almost functional again!
I just need 3 Voltage Spikes to complete the restoration.
Help me out and I'll teach you a useful technique!
quest_circuit_restore_active: Bzzt... still need those Voltage Spikes.
3 of them should do the trick. You can buy them at shops.
quest_circuit_restore_complete: Bzzt-BZZT! Perfect! These are exactly what I needed!
As promised, let me upload this skill to your neural link.
quest_circuit_restore_done: Thanks to you, I'm almost like new.
quest_factory_sweep_offer: The Plasma Hounds have taken over the assembly lines.
I need you to eliminate 3 of them so I can resume work.
There's high-grade armor in it for you.
quest_factory_sweep_active: Those Plasma Hounds are still prowling around.
I need 3 of them dealt with. Watch out for their fire.
quest_factory_sweep_complete: The factory floor is clear? Outstanding!
This Titanium Aegis Plate is yours. Finest armor I've made.
quest_factory_sweep_done: The assembly lines are running again thanks to you.
If I forge anything new, you'll be the first to know.
